name: TopexPina Colada
organization: Dentsply LLC. Professional Division Trading as "Sultan Healthcare"
indications: 1. usage indicated topical anesthetic oral mucosa prior local anesthetic injections, scaling prophylaxis. also useful relieve discomfort associated taking impressions intraoral radiographs. apply required.
warningsAndPrecautions: 5. methemoglobinemia warning: product may cause methemoglobinemia, rare serious condition must treated promptly reduces amount oxygen carried blood. stop seek immediate medical attention patient care develops: pale, gray blue colored skin ( cyanosis ) headache rapid heart rate shortness breath dizziness lightheadedness fatigue lack energy children 2 years age keep reach children professional dental take care contaminate jar reintroducing used cotton applicator jar
indications_original: 1. INDICATIONS AND USAGE Indicated as a topical anesthetic for use on oral mucosa prior to local anesthetic injections, scaling and prophylaxis. Also useful to relieve discomfort associated with taking impressions and intraoral radiographs.  Apply as required.
contraindications_original: 4. CONTRAINDICATIONS Do not use onindividuals with a known sensitivity to benzocaine or PABA.
warningsAndPrecautions_original: 5. WARNINGS AND PRECAUTIONS METHEMOGLOBINEMIA WARNING: Use of this product may cause methemoglobinemia, a rare but serious condition that must be treated promptly because it reduces the amount of oxygen carried in blood.  Stop use and seek immediate medical attention if the patient in your care develops: pale, gray or blue colored skin (cyanosis) headache rapid heart rate shortness of breath dizziness or lightheadedness fatigue or lack of energy Not for use in children under 2 years of age Keep out of reach of children For professional dental use only Take care not to contaminate the jar by reintroducing a used cotton applicator into the jar
